name: SpaceshipSurface
title: Spaceship Surface Skin
author: DellAquila
description: Only a Spaceship Skin, no changes in the game. Take a look how your factory looks in space! If you are modder, please use this mod to make a real Space Modification. Maybe great to play with Seablock. I would not publish, but I will abandon the project so I'll leave it here as a way of sharing the idea. Based in a photo by Factorio Blog.
